Audio Description: This poster features Uncle Sam stressing the importance of keeping silent about military and naval affairs. The colored illustration of the character appears on a blue background. He is wearing a top hat with red and white stripes. The band of the hat is blue with white stars. White hair emerges from under the white brim of the hat and hangs over his ears. His white beard is long and thin. The collar of his shirt is white and he is wearing a red bow tie. The cuff of his shirt is red and white stripes. His right hand is raised to his face with his index finger over his lips. The text on the poster is printed in white and red letters and reads: “I’m counting on you! Don’t discuss: troop movements, ship sailings, war equipment.”
Creator: United States. Office of War Information
Description: Poster, 26 x 18 cm, artist: Leon Helguera
Rights: Materials in this collection are made available by the Illinois State Library. To request reproductions or inquire about permissions, contact:  islimg@ilsos.net. Please cite the item title and collection name.

Title: I'm counting on you!: don't discuss troop movements, ship sailings, war equipment
